review: Great interface! Very easy to use
author: Amazon Customer

review: love this gizmo.  Better than Roku or the Google version.  Has all the apps you need and works flawlessly.  Interface is very easy to navigate.
author: Matt F

review: Very easy to install and was ready to go with all of my information.
author: Megan P Dyer

review: I was amazed how easy it was to set this up.  As simple as plugging the usb into the TV and the power cord into the usb.  That was it!  I turned on the TV and before I knew it I was selecting a show from Amazon Prime with the tiny remote that came with it and watching.  I don't even think it took a full minute between taking it out of the box and sitting down to a great show.
author: C. Cook

review: Great product.  Installed this on my kid's TV and she loves it.  No loss in picture or sound and the quality of both is really good.
author: Rick

review: I love the fire stick.  The remote is handy and being able to run plex and Netflix without changing source on tv is convenient for my last days in bed
author: colin

review: I had trouble at first navigating with the remote but I think I have gotten better as I keep using it.  I am not good with modern gadgetsI am in my late seventies I great grandchildren can help me.
author: BHB

review: Great little stick.  Got more power than my Roku stick.  Great for watching Sling TV.
author: John Graham

review: Great product and easy to use.  It takes up no room, and can be hidden perfectly.  Great job Amazon
author: Zombie's are a girls best friend
